description: and a little old
old old old old old
Can't choose this as an 'open with' application on image files. File browser stays if I choose a file and canvas overlaps tool panel. Crashes when I try to drag a selection.
Just trying to crop an image and it crashed!
I would like a painting app similar to mspaint.

A window opened upon launch. It was full of controls that had colors, brushes, and lots of exciting bits to press to, presumably, find really awesome things to do. But, there was no canvas. So, I clicked for a new canvas, and ... it opened up in another window, with less controls, no clear instructions , and, apparently, no way to choose or change pen / brush styles or sizes or anything, except color. So, I removed it. 

Maybe it's me. I don't know! But, I know I learned how to use Corel Photo-Paint, as it advanced through the years since 1993 or whenever it was we got that first one, without reading the instruction manual and it is supposed to be vastly more complicated than this! So, no thank you.
summary: Not as intuitive as it should be

description:
After copying image clips or portion of the screen (via screenshot), xPaint does not allow pasting it into the open canvas for editing. 

Missing a someting big here!
Less user pro..

I was just trying to do something simple. I wanted to load a 10x10 png image and scale it up to 1024x1024; you would thing that would take about 30 seconds on a decent simple image editor. lol - nope!

When I eventually figured out how to load the file select the image, and resize the canvas, then expand the region I had selected I discovered that:

1) the input boxes labelled "Expansion factor x" and "Expansion factor y" were not actually expansion factors at all, they were inputs for the final size.

2) Finally when I had figured that out, the resulting expanded image was so fuzzy and blured it was useless.
summary: Confusing an ugly interface. Very hard to use

description: it is useless and not working as you wish
summary: the worst i have ever seen

struggled and failed to embed a image to a existing image

The app doesn't allow for print-screenshots to be pasted onto the canvas, a basic quick function allows for ease of communication i usally use apps like MS Paint for.
Pretty big oversight since a lightweight app which isn't designed to create masterworks with like this usally fill this niché ideally.

Yes, outdated, still useful and good as MsPaint.
Mabe a improvement, or additions could be added to 
spice it up for more young users. I'm ol' in age now,
so, I have no problem with linux softare being legacy
as long as it still works, or gets the job done with 
modern linux(s) *smiles*

description:
super basica, pero es lo que buscaba, poder seleccionar secciones de una imagen y guardarlas como otro archivo, copia y pega.
el capturador de pantalla es genial, seleccionas lo que quieres y guardas
la aplicación es muy basica e comparación a paint
summary: la aplicación es muy basica e comparación a paint

description: Sympa et presque intuitif (quand même lire le manuel joint), plaisant à l’œil ce qui est agréable, plus de fonctions dessins que mettons photofiltre sous schmurz (ne faites pas ça chez vous, c'est un charmant sournois) quoique moins ergonomique (ex. : pas de ctrl+z il faut éditer, puis défaire) mais plante toutes les 10 minutes quand on lance tel ou tel outil... ici en tout cas. Abandon au 3ème essai.
Брак, а не ПО. Постоянно отваливается и перезапускается
Но по состоянию на 2021 год хочется допилить прежде чем пользоваться.
редактор не очень удобный, но очень минималистичный. Один из вариантов для замены paint
